tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EmployeeSchedules (
  event_id INT,
  employee_id INT,
  event_date DATE,
  shift_start TIME,
  shift_end TIME
)

CREATE TABLE EventSchedules (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(50),
    event_date DATE,
    event_location VARCHAR(100),
    event_duration TIME
);

CREATE TABLE ShiftSchedules (
    shift_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    shift_date DATE,
    shift_start TIME,
    shift_end TIME,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE fashion_show_event (
  event_id INT,
  event_name VARCHAR(50),
  event_date DATE,
  event_location VARCHAR(100),
  event_timeslot TIME
);

CREATE TABLE store_shift (
  shift_id INT,
  shift_date DATE,
  shift_start_time TIME,
  shift_end_time TIME,
  employee_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE store_shifts (
    shift_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    shift_date DATE,
    shift_start_time TIME,
    shift_end_time TIME,
    store_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    event_id INT,
    shift_id INT,
    schedule_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ShiftSchedule (
    shift_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id UUID,
    shift_date DATE,
    shift_location VARCHAR(255),
    shift_start_time TIME,
    shift_end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE Employee (
    employee_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(255),
    employee_role VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    email VARCHAR(255)
);
